name: Furs~
description:
Hello there!

Interested in trying out Furs? Furs is a visual novel which has furry frendos waiting for you! You can choose your name and gender! Also at the beginning in case you get confused, "She or he" is asking which pronoun you use, same for "Her or his" and "Girl or boy", because i'm too stupid to make it easier for you! :P

My best friend has helped me out with the art, she makes the art of Rift and Mlem, Mlem is the red velvet goat boi, and Rift is well...You'll see! ;P Mlem will be in the game later on.

I make half of the artwork and do all of the scripting stuff

My best friend does the other half of the artwork, the backgrounds, and helps with ideas.
